org.apache.naming.resources.jndi
Class Handler

java.lang.Object
  java.net.URLStreamHandler
      org.apache.naming.resources.DirContextURLStreamHandler
          org.apache.naming.resources.jndi.Handler

public class Handler
extends DirContextURLStreamHandler

Stream handler to a JNDI directory context. For use when embedding Tomcat and the embedding application has already set its own URLStreamHandlerFactory and the Tomcat jndi handler needs to be registered via the java.protocol.handler.pkgs system property.
